page.title: 16CORRYMEELA SUMMERFEST'85
page.content: TO BEGIN TO UNDERSTAND THE GOSPEL OF JESUS CHRIST ONE MUST FIRST LEARN TO STAND ON ONES HEAD. GK CHESTERTON, THROUGH TALKS, DISCUSSIONS, DRAMA, MUSIC, WORKSHOPS AND WORSHIP. {SUMMERFEST'85}WILL LEAD US INTO THE UPSIDE_DOWN KINGDOM.EACH DAY OUR THINKING WILL BE CENTERED ON ONE OF THESE BEATIFADES OR JESUS' SAYING AND THE QUESTION IT RAISES FOR US TODAY, SO ALTHOUGH THE WEEK AS A WHOLE HAS A THEME AND A FLOW, EACH INDIVIDUAL DAY WILL ALS0 BE A COMPLETE PROGRAME IN ITSELF. THE MORNINGS WILL INCLUDE A PRESENTATION ON THE THEME BY A KEYNOTE SPEAKER. THE AFTERNOONS WILL OFFER A WIDE VARIETY OF OPTIONS, INCLUDING THE FREEDOM JUST TO WANDER OFF AND ENJOY THE BEAUTY OF THIS MARVELLOUS CORNER OF IRELAND. THE WHOLE EVENT WILL BE A FESTIVAL,AND A HOLIDAY.
